document.full_text: toni preckwinkle, the cook county board president, issued a 20-page brochure assessing her first 100 days in office. some of it reflects well; other parts show that much still needs to be done.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: 100-day spotlight shines on preckwinkle
lines_and_colors: toni preckwinkle, the cook county board president, issued a 20-page brochure assessing her first 100 days in office. some of it reflects well; other parts show that much still needs to be done.
